Descr: The official name of the organization (e.g. the registered company name).
A contact point for a person or organization.
The location of the event, organization or action.
A member of an Organization or a ProgramMembership. Organizations can be members of organizations; ProgramMembership is typically for individuals.
An Organization (or ProgramMembership) to which this Person or Organization belongs.
A relationship between an organization and a department of that organization, also described as an organization.
The date that this organization was dissolved.
Products owned by the organization or person.
The larger organization that this organization is a branch of, if any.
A relationship between two organizations where the first includes the second (e.g. as a subsidiary).
